body:
Sorry, I'm an newbie in golang, it seems wired for me that in

```go
&File{fd: fd, name: name}
```

`fd` literal means field while in

```go
a := [...]string   {Enone: "no error", Eio: "Eio", Einval: "invalid argument"}
```

`Enone` will first being evaluated before decide which field it belongs to.
